description:
Nifuji Hirotaka was http://anidb.net/ch90535 [Narumi]`s childhood http://anidb.net/t1133 [otaku] friend. Hirotaka is a gamer otaku who spends most of his free time gaming and unlike Narumi, does not care if everyone knows that he is an otaku. He is also considered to be very attractive by girls, although he doesn`t seem to care. He has been in love with Narumi since childhood and the two are dating.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Nifuji Hirotaka
